---
title: "Hello, Quarto"
format:
  typst:
    keep-typ: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        -
          ['#figure\(\[(\r\n?|\n)#figure']
        -
          ['#block\[(\r\n?|\n)#figure\(\[(\r\n?|\n)#block\[(\r\n?|\n)#figure']
---

```{r}
#| label: tbl-example1
#| tbl-cap: Table created with `knitr::kable()`
#| echo: false

set.seed(1)
data <- data.frame(x = rnorm(30), y = rnorm(30))
knitr::kable(
  head(data),
  digits = 2
)
```
